CustomField.description: Use a semi-colon separated list if to include the values for the Group By. For example, if the object is Case and the columns are Grouped on the field Status. To exclude "New" and "Closed" cases, enter in this field: New;Closed Make sure the order is the proper order as well.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use a semi-colon separated list if to include the values for the Group By. For example, if the object is Case and the columns are Grouped on the field Status. To exclude "New" and "Closed" cases, enter in this field: New;Closed Make sure the order is the proper order as well.
CustomField.label: Values To Include for Group By
